page: Foundation for Universal Responsibility of His Holiness the Dalai Lama
message: The criticism is inadequate on the grounds that the Foundation has uploaded its financial transactions on the website. The information in the book needs to be verified before being uploaded on wikipedia. About WISCOMP, it is a pioneering peacebuilding initiaitve which does not just work on India and Pakistan or Jammu and Kashmir. Such selective appropriation is dangerous to be uploaded on a page like wikipedia

message: According to the official website of the Foundation, <http://furhhdl.org/about-us/statutory-discoures-as-per-goi-fcra/>, the balance sheets have already been uploaded. Such information may prove dangerous and draw unnecessary attention due to misinformation
